data.text:
@greg_travis Wow.
Why would parents put sear belts on their kids in the car?
I mean how many cars are driven in a day with kids in it and don't have accidents compared to how many have.
How many parents drive 2x the speed limit with kids in the car?.

I know it's ludicrous isn't it.

@boulderfish @greg_travis None of those people are actual experts w/r/t the data they distort. Just b/c you have an MD or PhD doesn't mean sh*t when you pretend to play at being an expert well outside your lane.
